Module.name: sketch

Function.name: flipAll
Function.Arg: Indicates whether to flip the images horizontally.
Indicates whether to flip the images vertically.
Function.Description: Performs a horizontal and/or vertical flip on a sequence of Image instances. Returns a new list of images.

Function.name: onResize
Function.Arg: A reference to the Sketch instance.
A reference to the pygame.event.EventType object.
Function.Description: This is the default event handler function for VIDEORESIZE events. The function scales all sprite properties to the resize sketch size and returns the scale factor.

Module.Constant: Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is to be drawn and updated.
Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is to be updated but not drawn.
Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is not to be drawn or updated.
Indicates that a sprite is not disabled.
Indicates no action to be taken when the sprite reaches the edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite bounces from the edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite wraps to the far edge when crossing an edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite is to be removed when it leaves the sketch area.
